name: Queens Blade
description: In the old time, Queen uses this blade to protect her people.

name: Flame of Alabus
description: Since Tilia has fallen, Alabus's anger has only made this fire burns even brighter.

name: Edinear's Tears
description: Edinear was the mother of all. Her tear purify all unholiness.

name: Shield of Tilia
description: A giant shield Standing in front of Tilia, no one could ever pick up.
